c:complexType.name: PlotTrending

c:property.name: type
c:property.c:documentation:
The type of trend to perform on the data of the associated plot.
The specified trend type must have been previously defined in the CCC library, through the pvc.trends.define method.
Some trend types come with the CCC library. Currently these are:
'linear'
performs a simple linear regression (see )
'moving-average'
performs a simple moving average (see ); the additional option periods, which defaults to 3, and must not be less than 2, may be specified to control the number of data points of the average window.
'weighted-moving-average'
performs a weighted moving average (see ); the additional option periods, which defaults to 3, and must not be less than 2, may be specified to control the number of data points of the average window.

c:property.name: label
c:property.c:documentation:
A description to show next to the trended data.
The description shows next to legend items and in auto-generated tooltips.
The default value is the description of the associated trend type.
